select ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content, ic.sepc_name as sepcName, ic.created_time as createdTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname as nickname from items_comments ic left join users u on ic.user_id = u.id where ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
and ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

select i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price from items i left join items_img ii on i.id = ii.item_id left join ( select item_id,min(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec group by item_id ) tempSpec on tempSpec.item_id = i.id where ii.is_main = 1
and i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc

select i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price from items i left join items_img ii on i.id = ii.item_id left join ( select item_id,min(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec group by item_id ) tempSpec on tempSpec.item_id = i.id where ii.is_main = 1 and i.cat_id = #{paramsMap.catId} order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc
